# writeonly_data (Resource)

A resource that mimics terraform_data with write-only input support.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "writeonly_data" "example" {
  # Can accept ephemeral values:
  # input_wo = ephemeral.tls_private_key.ssh.public_key_openssh
  input_wo         = "example-write-only-value"
  input_wo_version = 1
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `input_wo` (String, Sensitive) Write-only input that accepts ephemeral values. The value is stored in `output`.
- `input_wo_version` (Number) When changed, triggers re-capture of the input_wo value.
- `triggers_replace` (List of String) Forces replacement when value changes.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Unique identifier
- `output` (String) The captured value from input_wo.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
# Import command
terraform import writeonly_data.example <id>
```
